K14bsu002_u:2: evaṃ mayā śrutam - ekasmin samaye bhagavān potalake parvate viharati sma /
K14bsu002_u:6: anekaiśca śuddhāvāsikairdevaputra koṭiniyutaśatasahasraiḥ parivṛtaḥ puraskṛta īśvaramaheśvarabrahmakāyikān devaputrān adhikṛtya dharma deśayati sma /
K14bsu002_u:7: atha khalu āryāvalokiteśvaro bodhisattvo mahāsattva utthāyāsanādekāṃ samuttarāsaṃgaṃ
K14bsu002_u:8: kṛtvā dakṣiṇaṃ jānumaṇḍalaṃ pṛthivyāṃ pratiṣṭhāpya yena bhagavān tenāñjaliṃ kṛtvā
K14bsu002_u:10: asti mama bhagavan amoghapāśarājannāma hṛdayaṃ yanmayā pūrvvamekanavatime kalpe vilokitāyāṃ lokadhātau lokendrarājo nāma tathāgatasya sakāśādudgṛhītam
K14bsu002_u:11: yena bhagavannīśvara devamaheśvara devaputrapramukhāni vahūni śuddhāvāsikāyika devaputrapramukhānyanekadevaputraśatasahasrāṇi
K14bsu002_u:12: samādāpitānyanuttarāyāṃ samyaksambodhau asaṃmohajñānavyūhapramukhāni ca mayā daśasamādhiśatasahasrāṇi pratilabdhāni /
K14bsu002_u:13: yasmiṃśca puna rbhagavan pṛthivī pradeśe idamamoghapāśahṛdayaṃ pracaret /
K14bsu002_u:14: veditavyaṃ bhagavan stasmin pṛthivīpradeśe īśvaramaheśvarabrahmakāyikapramukhāni dvādaśadevaputraśatasahasrāṇi rakṣāvaraṇaguptaye sthāsyanti
K14bsu002_u:17: aneka buddhakoṭi niyutaśatasahasrāvaropitakuśalamūlāste bhagavan sattvā bhaviṣyanti /
K14bsu002_u:21: avīciparāyaṇaḥ sarvabuddhabodhisattva ārya śrāvakapratyeka buddha pratikṣepakaḥ /
K14bsu002_u:24: yasyaiva tāvadbhagavan ekopavāho jāpena ihaiva janmani tatkarma viśudhyati /
K14bsu002_u:26: ekāhikena jvareṇa dvāhikena trāhikena vā cāturthikena vā evaṃ saptāhi kena vā jvareṇa /
K14bsu002_u:27: akṣiśūlena vā karṇa śūlena vā nāsāśūlena vā /
K14bsu002_u:29: tāluśūlena va hṛdayaśūlena va udaraśūlena vā pārśvaśūlena vā kaṭiśūlena vā aṅgapratyaṅgaśūlena
K14bsu002_u:30: vā arśagrahaṇīśūlena vā atisāreṇa vā hastapādaveda nayā vā śirorujā va valāhakaścitra
K14bsu002_u:33: saṃkṣepato bhagavan kāyapīḍayāvā cittapīḍayā vā dusvapnadarśanaṃ vā tatkarmaparikṣayaṃ gacchati /
K14bsu002_u:35: prāgeva śuddhasattvānāṃ śraddhādhimuktikānāṃ yadi bhagavan catasraḥ pariṣadaścatvāro varṇā yāmā yā sāthenāpiya idamadiyama amoghapāśahṛdayaṃ śroṣyanti /
K14bsu002_u:36: udgrahīṣyanti dhārayiṣyanti vācayiṣyanti likhiṣyanti likhāpayiṣyanti paryavāpsyanti
K14bsu002_u:37: anyeṣāṃ sattvānāṃ śrāvayiṣyanti antastiryagyonigatānāṃ vā sattvānāṃ karṇāpūṭasthitvā
K14bsu002_u:43: teṣāṃ daśabhyo digbhyo buddhasahasraṃ saṃmukhaṃ darśanaṃ kariṣyanti /
K14bsu002_u:50: jñātavyamiti bhagavan paṇḍite nāryāvalokiteśvarasyānubhāvena teṣāṃ karṇapuṭe śabdo niścarati /
K14bsu002_u:51: tadyathāpi nāma bhagavan kaścidevapurūṣaścandanaṃ vā kapūraṃ vā kasturikaṃ vā ākṛṣya paribhāṣya śilāyāṃ vā piṣṭvā ātmānaṃ lepayet /
K14bsu002_u:52: na tasya candanasya kapurakasya kasturikāyā vā /
K14bsu002_u:53: evaṃ bhavatyanāmākṛṣṭaḥ paribhāṣito vā gandhenāti kramiṣyāmiti /
K14bsu002_u:54: api ca gandha eva sa eva meva bhagavanidaṃ madoyamamoghapāśannāma hṛdayaṃ yaḥ kaścidudgrāsdya ullāpya /
K14bsu002_u:57: teṣāṃ bhagavana khakānāṃ sattvānāṃ sa eva kuśalamūla heturbhaviṣyati /
K14bsu002_u:58: yatra yatropapatsyante tatra tatra virahitāśca bhaviṣyanti /
K14bsu002_u:60: yaḥ kaścit bhagavan kulaputro vā kuladuhitā vā bhikṣurvā bhikṣuṇī vā upāśako vā upāśikā vā /
K14bsu002_u:63: tasya bhagavan dṛṣṭa eva dharmma viśatiranuśaṃsaḥ pratikāṃkṣitavyāḥ /
K14bsu002_u:66: utpanāścāsya rogāḥ karmmavaśena śīghraṃ prasamaṃ yāsyanti /
K14bsu002_u:76: saptavārāna amoghapāśahṛdayena bhasmodakaṃ vā parijapya digavidigūrddhaṃ ca kṣetrasya vandho dātavya /
K14bsu002_u:82: utpannacāsya śatru bhayaṃ śīghraṃ praśamaṃ yāsyati /
K14bsu002_u:84: na kākhorddhabhayaṃ na cāsya ḍākinībhayaṃ na cāsya tīvrāḥ kleśopakleśā bhaviṣyanti /
K14bsu002_u:87: yatra yatropapatsyante tatra tatrāvirahitaśca bhaviṣyati maitrīkarūṇāmuditopekṣāyāḥ /
K14bsu002_u:102: dine dine triṣkālaṃ triṇi vārān pariāvarttayitavyaṃ /
K14bsu002_u:104: ayaṃ cāmoghapāśahṛdayo nāma dharmaparyāyaḥ sarvasatvānāṃ ca valāvalaṃ jñātvā śrāvayitavyam /
K14bsu002_u:107: satvānāmārthakaraṇena buddhabodhiḥ prāpyate bodhirityucyate prajñāsattva ityupāyaḥ //
K14bsu002_u:110: idaṃ hṛdayaṃ tathāgatasya purataḥ kīrtta yeyaṃ catasṛṇāṃ parṣadām arthāyabodhisattvaṃ mahāsattvametadavocata /
K14bsu002_u:112: anumoditaṃ tathāgatena paścime kāle paścime samaye bodhisattvayānikānāṃ pitṛkāryakariṣyanti /
K14bsu002_u:113: atha khalu āryāvalokiteśvaro bodhisattvo mahāsattvo 'nibhiṣanayano bhūtvā bhagavanta metadabocata /
K14bsu002_u:114: śṛṇu me bhagavan sarvabodhisattva namaskṛtamidaṃ vimokṣamukhamaṇḍalaṃ bahujanahitāya bahujanasukhāya lokānukampāyai mahato janakāyasyārthāya hitāya sukhāya //
K14bsu002_u:115: nāmastryadhvānugatapratiṣṭhitebhya sarvabuddhabodhisattvebhyo namaḥ pratyekabuddhāryaśrāvaka saṃghebhyo 'tītānāgatapratyutpannebhyo namaḥ samyaggatānāṃ
K14bsu002_u:122: namaḥ śikhine tathāgatāya arhate samyak sambuddhāya /
K14bsu002_u:129: om same same mahāsame rakṣa rakṣa māṃ sarvasattvānāṃca sarvapāpaprasamane svāhā // // //
K14bsu002_u:134: namo buddhāya namo dharmāya namaḥ saṃghāya /
K14bsu002_u:135: namo atītānāgata pratyutpannebhyo buddhebhyo bhagavadbhyaḥ // tadyathā //
K14bsu002_u:136: smṛtivarddhani gativarddhani dhṛtivarddhani prajñāvarddhani pratibhānavarddhani dhyānavarddhani
K14bsu002_u:138: namo ratnatrayāya namo āryāvalokiteśvarāya bodhisattvāya mahāsattvāya mahākārūṇikāya /
K14bsu002_u:140: saṃmukhabhāṣitaṃ mahatā parṣata madhye ahamidāniṃmāvarttayiṣye sidhyantu me mantrapadā sarvvakāryāṇi /
K14bsu002_u:141: sarvabhayebhyo mama sarvasattvānāṃca rakṣā bhavatu // tadyathā //
K14bsu002_u:142: om cara 2 ciri 2 curū 2 mara 2 miri 2 murū 2 mahākārūṇika /
K14bsu002_u:143: sara 2 siri 2 surū 2 curū 2 ciri 2 viri 2 piri 2 miri 2 mahāpadāhasta /
K14bsu002_u:145: buddhaya 2 bodha 2 bodhi 2 bodhaya 2 kaṇa 2 kiṇi 2 kuṇu 2 paramaśuddhasattva /
K14bsu002_u:147: cala 2 saṃcala 2 vicala 2 eṭaṭa 2 bhara 2 bhiri 2 bhurū 2 tara 2
K14bsu002_u:150: dhara 2 dhiri 2 dharū 2 tara 2 sara 2 cara 2 para 2 vara 2 mara 2 lara 2 hara 2 hāhā hīhī hūhū //
K14bsu002_u:152: dhara 2 dhiri 2 dhurū 2 tara 2 sara 2 cara 2 para 2 vara 2 hara harā rasmisahasrapratimaṇḍiśarīrā /
K14bsu002_u:153: jvela 2 tapa 2 bhāsa 2 bhrama 2 bhagavana somāditya yamavarūṇakuverabrahmendravāyuagnidhanada ṛṣi devagaṇebhyarcitacaraṇa /
K14bsu002_u:154: surū 2 curū 2 murū 2 dhurū 2 sanatkumārarudravāsavaviṣṇudhanadavāyuagni ṛṣi nāyakavināyaka /
K14bsu002_u:156: dhara 2 dhiri 2 dhurū 2 tara 2 thara 2 dhara 2 para 2 lara 2 hara 2 yara 2 sara 2 vara 2 varadāyaka samantāvalokita lokeśvara tribhuvaneśvarasarvvaguṇa samalaṅkṛta avalokiteśvara /
K14bsu002_u:157: muhu 2 murū 2 muya 2 muṃca 2 rakṣa 2 māṃ sarvasatvānāṃca sarvabhayaibhyaḥ sarvopadravebhyaḥ sarvopasagebhyaḥ sarvagrahebhyaḥ sarvavyādhibhya
K14bsu002_u:159: evaṃ vandha vandhana tāḍana tarjjana rāja taskarāgnyūdaka viṣaśastraparimocaka // kaṇa 2
K14bsu002_u:160: kiṇi 2 kuṇu 2 cara 2 ciri 2 curū 2 indriyabalabodhyaṅgacaturāryasaṃprakāśaka //
K14bsu002_u:161: tama 2 dama 2 sama 2 masa 2 dhama 2 mahakārūṇika mahātamondhakāravidhamana ṣaḍpāramitā paripūraka //
K14bsu002_u:172: kara 2 kiri 2 kurū 2 para 2 hara 2 hiri 2 vara 2 sara 2 kara 2 kaṭa 2 kiṭi 2 kuṭu 2 maṭa 2 /
K14bsu002_u:173: mahāśuddhasattva viṣayanivāsina mahākārūṇika śvetayajñopavitaratna makuṭa mālādhara /
K14bsu002_u:174: sarvajñaśirasi kṛta jaṭāmakuṭa mahādbhuta kamalālaṅkṛta karataladhyānasamādhivimokṣaṃ aprakampya bahusattva santatiparivāraka /
K14bsu002_u:192: om raṇa raṇa om phaṭ svāhā /
K14bsu002_u:196: oṃ hrīḥ trailokyavijayāmoghapāśapratihata hrīṃ haḥ hūṃ phaṭ svāhā /
K14bsu002_u:200: oṃ ārolika hrīṃ hrīṃ hūṃ phaṭ svāhā // //
K14bsu002_u:201: sarṣaparavadirakīlakādyaiḥ sarvajvareṣu sūtrakaṃ vandhayitavyaṃ sarvavyādhiṣu ghṛtatailamudakaṃ vā parijapya dātavyaṃ /
K14bsu002_u:202: kākhordacchedanaṃ rakṣā sūtreṇa śastreṇa udaraśūlena lavaṇodakaṃ viṣa nāśanaṃ mṛttikayā udakena vā cakṣurogena śvetasūtrakaṃ karṇe vandhayitavyaṃ
K14bsu002_u:204: sīmāvandhe paṃcaraṅigakasūtrakamekaviṃśativārān parijapya catuḥṣu khadirakīleṣu vaddhvā caturddiśaṃ nikhātavyaṃ simā vandho bhavati /
K14bsu002_u:205: sarvarakṣā sūtrakena udakena bhasmakena vā sarvagraheṣu /
K14bsu002_u:206: paṃcaraṅigaka sūtrakaṃ sarvajvareṣu śvetasūtrakaṃ sarppakīṭhalūtalohaliṅgala graheṣu /
K14bsu002_u:208: gandhodakaṃ palāśodakaṃ madhūyaṣṭyudaka vā sarvakalikalaha vivādebhyaḥ ākhyāneṣu udakaṃ parijapya mukhaprakṣālayitavyaṃ /
K14bsu002_u:209: paraviṣayarājyarāṣṭrakeṣu pūrṇakalaśaṃ sthāpayitvā śūcināsūcivastraprāvṛtena mahatī pūjāṃ kṛtvā bācayitavyaṃ /
K14bsu002_u:211: tena codakena sektavyaṃ sarvasattvānāṃ rakṣā kṛtā bhavati /
K14bsu002_u:213: mudritāyā candanatilakaṃ hṛdaye ekaviṃśativārān parijapya kartavyaṃ sarvānantaryāṇi kṣayaṃ yānti /
K14bsu002_u:220: gandhaḥ priyaṃgu tagaracakrā mahācakrāviṣṇukrāntā somarājī sūnandā ceti /
K14bsu002_u:222: aṣṭottaraśatavārān parijapya maṇiṃ kṛtvā śirasi bāhau vā dhārayitavyaṃ /
K14bsu002_u:223: bālānāṃ galenārīṇāṃ vilagne svayaṃ paraṃ saubhāgyakaraṃ /
K14bsu002_u:231: āryāvallokiteśvarahṛdayaṃ paramasiddhamasasādhita mete tāni karmmāṇi kurute /
K14bsu002_u:234: eṇeya carmakṛtaparikaraḥ paśupativeśadhara sarvālaṅkāravibhūṣitaṃ kṛtvā poṣadhikena
K14bsu002_u:236: tataḥsādhakena tasyāgrataḥ gomayena maṇḍalaṃ kṛtvā śvetapuṣpāvakīrṇa aṣṭāu gandhodakapūrṇakumbhāḥ sthāpayitavyāḥ /
K14bsu002_u:238: vali mānsaṃ ca rūdhirabarjjitaṃ agarūdhūpaṃ dahatā vidyāaṣṭamasahasraṃ jāpayitavyā /
K14bsu002_u:240: triśūklabhojina triṣkālasnāpayitā śūcivastraprāvṛtto bhūtvā japā dātavyaṃ /
K14bsu002_u:241: ataḥ pratimāyā 'rpataḥ ātmānaṃ ca likhitaṃ paśyati /
K14bsu002_u:242: taddaṣṭvā ca prahṛṣyati yāvat svapnane vā āryāvalokiteśvaro āgacchati /
K14bsu002_u:244: manaḥ śilāṃ rajataṃ vā parijapya kṣīṇāṃjayitvā tatoantarhito bhavati /
K14bsu002_u:248: idamavocat bhagavānāttamanā āryāvalokiteśvaro bodhisattvo mahāsattva rūteca bhikṣavarūte
K14bsu002_u:249: ca bodhisatvāste śuddhāvāsakāyikāśca devaputrāḥ sadevamānuṣāsura gandharvaścaloko
K14bsu002_u:253: hyavadatteṣāṃca yo nirodha evaṃ vādī mahāśramaṇaḥ //
